com.ibm.lpex.core
Class LpexViewAdapter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.ibm.lpex.core.LpexViewAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
LpexViewListener
public abstract class LpexViewAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements LpexViewListener

An abstract adapter class for receiving document view events. The methods in this class are empty, and do not stop any of the editor actions for which the events are issued.

This is a convenience class for creating listener objects. Extend this class to create a document view listener, and override only the methods for the events of interest. If you implement the LpexViewListener interface, you have to define all its methods; this abstract class defines null methods for all of them, so you must define methods only for those events you care about. This also eliminates the need for coding updates if new event notifications are defined in LpexViewListener.

Create a listener object using your class, and then register it with a document view using the view's addLpexViewListener() method. When an event occurs, the relevant method in the listener object is invoked. Example: 

   myLpexView.addLpexViewListener(new LpexViewAdapter() {
      // called after the updateProfile command has completed
      public void updateProfile(LpexView lpexView) {
         handleUpdateProfile(lpexView);
         }
      });

See Also:
LpexView.addLpexViewListener(com.ibm.lpex.core.LpexViewListener)

Method Detail

showing

public void showing(LpexView lpexView)
This method is invoked just before the screen is displayed. The screen is rebuilt and displayed after every user action. It is also rebuilt and displayed when the screenShow editor command is invoked.
Specified by:
showing in interface LpexViewListener
Following copied from interface: com.ibm.lpex.core.LpexViewListener

saving

public boolean saving(LpexView lpexView)
This method is invoked just before the document is saved. If you return true, then the remaining listeners will not be invoked and the save will be aborted.
Specified by:
saving in interface LpexViewListener
Following copied from interface: com.ibm.lpex.core.LpexViewListener

public boolean renaming(LpexView lpexView)
This method is invoked just before a document rename occurs. If you return true, then the remaining listeners will not be invoked and the rename will be aborted.
